duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive leasing strategies to meet POD-specific KPIs and exceed sales targets.
Lead and support leasing personnel in delivering high-quality listings, application processing, and exceptional customer satisfaction.
Analyze market trends and leasing velocity, ensuring effective positioning of rental properties and efficient leasing processes.
Ensure compliance with company procedures, best practices, and legal requirements, providing training to leasing department staff.
Manage and oversee all responsibilities assigned by company leadership, focusing on sales team and team leadership experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree; no preferences with respect to the focus of study 5+ years of leasing execution and/or management experienceKnowledge of SFR leasing best practices and commonly-leveraged resourcesCommitment to embodying the team’s target traits:ProfessionalismCourtesyAttention to DetailInitiative Communication & Coordination Transparency Reliability
